Articles.Content: I've been playing around with airplanes the past two days and I've noticed that the SAS occasionally "twitches" my control surfaces. It's not enough to really affect the craft or its flight, but it is definitely not a graphical glitch. Has anybody else experienced this?
I saw my plane twitch occasionally, then return quickly to proper orientation. But I don't know if the SAS was causing the twitch, or just responding to it.
Yeah, not necessarily blaming the SAS, I just don't notice it otherwise because if I'm maneuvering with a keyboard all the surfaces are twitching anyway...
I get this on some of my planes in hard turns, starts flapping like it did pre .21

The game has always done that. What your rockets the next time you send one up; you'll see little instants where the flame animation cuts out and the ship jiggles slightly. It's just more noticeable on planes.
